rooms.name: Lobby Entrance
rooms.description: Entrance area leading to open-plan kitchen and living area, ensuring direct access to the main living space.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen-Living Area
rooms.description: A large open space combining modern kitchen with a comfortable seating/living area. Designed for social gatherings and adheres to Vastu by keeping the entrance aligned with auspicious directions.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet/Utility Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the open-plan area, ensuring convenience while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Dedicated Home Office
rooms.description: A quiet zone with ample natural light and access to an east-facing window per Vastu guidelines for productivity and inspiration.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Includes storage, laundry, and a small pantry; strategically located near the kitchen.
